hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Prophet (ﷺ) was asked about a person who found moisture (on his body or clothes) but did not remember the sexual dream. He replied: He should take a bath. He was asked about a person who remembered that he had a sexual dream but did not find moisture. He replied: Bath is not necessary for him. Umm Salamah then asked: Is washing necessary for a woman if she sees that (in her dream)? He replied: Yes. Woman are counterpart of men

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَجِدُ الْبِلَّةَ فِي مَنَامِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A Person Who Sees Some Wetness (On His Clothes) After Sleeping
